It effectively highlights the empowerment, validation, and sacred mission entrusted to the apostles, all of which are crucial aspects of understanding the role of apostleship in fulfilling Jesus' command to spread the gospel. The connection between the answer provided and the concern is well-established, demonstrating a solid understanding of the Christian worldview regarding apostleship. Great job!
